item.title: Writing Python like it's Rust
item.description: - Programming in Rust has taught a software engineer to create more robust APIs and avoid common bugs while writing Python code.

item.title: The end of the accounting search
item.description: - LWN.net has shifted from QuickBooks to GnuCash for accounting, which offers a graphic interface, adaptable features, and meets all the necessary requirements.

item.title: GPT detectors are biased against non-native English writers
item.description: - GPT detectors are language models designed to identify plagiarism and gauge originality.

item.title: Rodney Brooks on GPT-4
item.description: - Rodney Brooks, a former faculty member at MIT, Carnegie Mellon, and Stanford University, urges people to stop conflating the performance of AI models like GPT-4 with their competence.

item.title: Suspicious iOS KeePass Client
item.description: - A suspicious KeePass client called iOSKeePass was discovered to have been sending clipboard contents to a third-party server and was removed from the App Store.

item.title: Potentially millions of Android TVs & phones come with malware preinstalled
item.description: - Multiple lines of Android devices, including TVs and phones, come with preinstalled malware that cannot be removed without users taking heroic measures, according to two reports.

item.title: Beej's Guide to Network Programming
item.description: - Beej's Guide to Network Programming is a how-to guide for network programming using Internet sockets, available on various platforms, including Unix, Linux, and Windows - The guide is aimed at individuals who know some C or C++, as it provides tips to make the API easier to digest - The guide offers resources for readers and translators and can be bought as a perfect-bound book.

item.title: Feynman Lectures on Physics (1964)
item.description: - Caltech and The Feynman Lectures Website are offering an online edition of Richard Feynman's lectures on physics, which can be accessed by anyone with internet and a web browser.

item.title: Show HN: Trogon – An automatic TUI for command line apps
item.description: - Trogon is an automatic TUI (Terminal User Interface) that generates user-friendly interfaces for command-line apps.

item.title: Dolphin Emulator: Progress Report February, March, & April 2023
item.description: - The Dolphin Emulator project has made significant progress in improving the Android input handling and implementing document provider support for easier access to app directories.
